definitions: an implement used for trimming off the unwanted or untidy parts of something
shortDefinitions: implement used for cutting and neatening something

definitions: a person who adapts their views to the prevailing political trends for personal advancement

examples.text: he is a clever trimmer, a closet federalist unchanged at heart

shortDefinitions: person who adapts their views to prevailing political trends for personal advancement

definitions: a crosspiece fixed between full-length joists (and often across the end of truncated joists) to form part of the frame of an opening in a floor or roof
shortDefinitions: crosspiece fixed between full-length joists to form part of frame of opening in floor or roof

definitions: a person responsible for trimming the sails of a yacht
shortDefinitions: person responsible for trimming sails of yacht

definitions: a person employed to arrange cargo or fuel in a ship's hold.
shortDefinitions: person employed to arrange cargo or fuel in ship's hold

definitions: a small capacitor or other component used to tune a circuit such as a radio set
shortDefinitions: small capacitor or other component used to tune circuit such as radio set
